name: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage
summary: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage is a compilation for the Nintendo 3DS and the last game of the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives series. This compilation includes the remaining five previously-released 3D Classics games, as well as four brand new games and two unlockable SG-1000 games given stereoscopic 3D support.
